alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 3:56AM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Tennessee, Henry and Gibson Counties. In Arkansas, St. Francis County. * WHEN...From noon Wednesday to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
